::Spears::

Nods to HotRod."Want to go and have some fun blasting some Preds?"
She turned and looked at the ship. "She's in worse shape now than she 
was when they first attacked.  And what gets me is that the main 
attack was on the ship it'self.  Not us, the ship." SHe looked at 
Striker, "I don't get it. WHy attack the ship more than us?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker nods at Spears' answer, turning to look at Hot Rod.
> 
> "Not much," he says to the fellow Maximal, "We're thinking of 
launching an 
> offensive against the Preds."
> 
> Striker glances at the Ark. "It might give them something to repair 
while we 
> fix this dump."
